title: Page Automator
description: Automate the process of creating multiple pages.

title: Variant Inspector
description: Makes it easy to get variant properties and place them above your variants.

title: Quick New Page
description: Add new pages in a super quick way. It's a shortcut to do an awesome job in your design files, to "add new pages."

title: Context
description: Count the number of characters, words, and paragraphs from a text layer.

title: Bukalapak Color Finder
description: Browse through the colors of the design system and get the variable color name.

title: Magic Export
description: Export and compress image assets for faster loading times on your website/apps.
